rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports a case using neutral language.
The segment reports Mexico 'reported its first commercial case'.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
This segment reports a factual negative event (first commercial case).
'exports just a fraction of the poultry it produces' uses minimiser 'just' with scale contrast 'fraction of the poultry it produces'.
